msbt.message: I heard somebody washed up on the beach, so I ran there to go see! And it was just Gulliver, sleeping!

K.K.'s gonna be doing a show tonight at eight o'clock!He takes requests at night, so I gotta think about what songs I wanna ask for.I'm so excited to see him! I have all his records! Some of them aren't even scratched!
I just saw Label walk by! I was too shy to say anything because I was afraid I might burp.I was right too! I burped so loud, I scared myself!
It's pretty exciting that Saharah is visiting right now!I'm gonna see what new stuff is in. I wanna arrange my house so my snack energy flows real good.

K.K.'s performing live in front of Resident Services today!He's taking requests to sing songs, so you should ask him to sing any songs you'd like to hear him sing!His voice is like butter Warmand dripping everywheregetting in your ears and on your popcorn and stuff
It's Sunday! That means Daisy Mae is here!Her fresh veggies are so yummy! I always eat everything I buy from her!

I dunno what's happening, but I feel real spooky. Or maybe gassy<10_4 /> But I think it's spooky.I think there's someone on the island who's not from this island!I'm smelling things! And they're not the smells I usually smell when I smell stuff!
Didja already go see K.K.'s birthday performance?It only happens once a year! You gotta watch it while ya can!
K.K. is in the plaza doing a birthday show!
I just saw Mabel! I wonder what kinda clothes she brought this time?I bought an outfit from her and Grandma said it made me look dashing!
C.J. is visiting today!He gets so excited when I bring him my fishies, he pays me for them!It's like he doesn't know they're free if you walk over to the river!
Flick is visiting today. I promised the bugs in my house that I wouldn't sell them to him.Ya don't sell your friends. That's suuuuper uncool.
Kicks is here visiting! I wonder what cool stuff he's got today? I'm gonna go look later, !
I saw Celeste! She's here! She likes the stars almost as much as I like her, .
I saw a new person on the island just now!I got all scared! And I hid!Can you maybe find out who they are?
